item.title: Viv: The Global Brain
item.description:
Viv: The Global Brain

Viv is a global platform that enables developers to create an intelligent interface to anything. Viv is taught by the world, knows more than it is taught, and learns every day.

item.title: Platform | Persado - Cognitive Content Platform
item.description:
Platform | Persado - Cognitive Content Platform

Persado owns the largest database of language and images that is proven to drive engagement. The platform runs on 1M+ curated and tagged emotional and motivational words, phrases, and images collected over several years and scored against response data from 40+ billion impressions.

item.title: Your 24/7 on-demand flight assistant
item.description:
Your 24/7 on-demand flight assistant

GoButler is your instant assistant that speaks your language - your personal travel agent.

item.title: The first Emotionally Intelligent speaker to empower your every moment
item.description:
The first Emotionally Intelligent speaker to empower your every moment

Get a special 40% discount now - only on Indiegogo: http://igg.me/at/moodbox/x/4710211 MoodBox is revolutionizing the world of the home music industry by using emotion and mood recognition capabilities to always play the music you love. MoodBox is more than just a speaker with crystal clear 360-degree hi-fi sound with ambient lighting - it also talks to you, understands you and empathizes with you.

item.title: Emotional Technology
item.description:
Emotional Technology

When we think of the future of technology, we often think of gadgets that will make us go faster. But the real development will be gadgets that help us with our emotions.

item.title: OpenAI
item.description:
OpenAI

OpenAI is a non-profit artificial intelligence research company. Our goal is to advance digital intelligence in the way that is most likely to benefit humanity as a whole, unconstrained by a need to generate financial return. Since our research is free from financial obligations, we can better focus on a positive human impact.

item.title: Sony's Ear Puts an AI Inside Your, Er, Ear
item.description:
Sony's Ear Puts an AI Inside Your, Er, Ear

Sony clearly watched Joaquin Phoenix in Her. Its latest announcement is an earpiece that interacts with your phone to inject the sweet mutterings of an AI straight into your skull. Welcome to the future. Just how "artificially intelligent" is it? So so.

item.title: New $5 Million X Prize for AI That Gives the Best TED Talk
item.description:
New $5 Million X Prize for AI That Gives the Best TED Talk

In 2020, three speakers will appear onstage to deliver a TED talk and compete for $5 million. But these presenters will share a unique characteristic that sets them apart from TED talkers who came before them: They won't be human.

item.title: What I learned teaching a course on artificial intelligence (and you can too)
item.description:
What I learned teaching a course on artificial intelligence (and you can too)

I recently finished teaching a free, eight-week online course on artificial intelligence and cognitive technologies. Over 7,000 students registered for the course. Many of them were active participants in rich discussions throughout the eight weeks.
